'''Stop! Gather Time.''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[A Realm Beyond: Series III]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to gather 800 items in "[[A Path of Value: Orderly Meadow]]."

==Trivia==
{{Transclude|Stop! Gather Time.|Trivia}}
* Despite being added in [[Version 2.0]], this achievement could not be earned until May 8, 2022 at the earliest, due to its high requirements. The game was in [[Version 2.6]] on this date. <!--Harvesting this many takes 7000 hours minimum at maximum efficiency (crops take 70 hours to grow, 8 harvests at a time, 100 harvests total). 7000 hours after July 20, 2021 20:00:00 (when 2.0 dropped) is May 8, 2022 12:00:00.-->
** Due to this, the [[Achievement: Full Bloom]] namecard was also unavailable until this date.
** The achievement takes a minimum of 7000 hours of growing, or 291 days.
